dcmTLSNeedClientAuth.title: TLS Need Client Auth
dcmTLSNeedClientAuth.description: Indicates if TLS client authentication is required.

dcmTCPBacklog.title: TCP Backlog
dcmTCPBacklog.description: Maximum queue length for incoming TCP connections. 0 = unlimited

dcmTCPConnectTimeout.title: TCP Connect Timeout
dcmTCPConnectTimeout.description: TCP connect timeout in ms; no timeout if absent

dcmTCPCloseDelay.title: TCP Close Delay
dcmTCPCloseDelay.description: TCP socket close delay in ms after send of A-ASSOCIATE-RJ, A-RELEASE-RP or A-ABORT PDU.

dcmTCPSendBufferSize.title: TCP Send Buffer Size
dcmTCPSendBufferSize.description: TCP send buffer size; use system defaults if absent

dcmTCPReceiveBufferSize.title: TCP Receive Buffer Size
dcmTCPReceiveBufferSize.description: TCP receive buffer size; use system defaults if absent

dcmBindAddress.title: Bind Address
dcmBindAddress.description: Bind address of listening socket; use hostname of the connection if absent

dcmClientBindAddress.title: Client Bind Address
dcmClientBindAddress.description: Bind address of outgoing connections; use hostname of the connection if absent

dcmMaxOpsPerformed.title: Max Ops Performed
dcmMaxOpsPerformed.description: Maximal number of operations to perform asynchronously; 0 = infinite.

dcmMaxOpsInvoked.title: Max Ops Invoked
dcmMaxOpsInvoked.description: Maximal number of operations to invoke asynchronously; 0 = infinite.

dcmPackPDV.title: Pack PDV
dcmPackPDV.description: Enable/disable packing of command and data PDVs into one P-DATA-TF PDU.

dcmAARQTimeout.title: AA-RQ Timeout
dcmAARQTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of A-ASSOCIATE-RQ PDU after TCP connect; no timeout if absent

dcmAAACTimeout.title: AA-AC Timeout
dcmAAACTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of A-ASSOCIATE-AC PDU after send of A-ASSOCIATE-RQ PDU; no timeout if absent

dcmARRPTimeout.title: AR-RP Timeout
dcmARRPTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of A-RELEASE-RP PDU after send of A-RELEASE-RQ PDU; no timeout if absent

dcmResponseTimeout.title: Response Timeout
dcmResponseTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of response message; no timeout if absent

dcmRetrieveTimeout.title: Retrieve Timeout
dcmRetrieveTimeout.description: Timeout in ms for receive of C-GET-RSP or C-MOVE-RSP; no timeout if absent

dcmRetrieveTimeoutTotal.title: Retrieve Timeout Total
dcmRetrieveTimeoutTotal.description: Indicates if the timer with the specified timeout for outstanding C-GET and C-MOVE RSPs shall be restarted on receive of pending RSPs (=false) or not (=true).

dcmIdleTimeout.title: Idle Timeout
dcmIdleTimeout.description: Indicates aborting of idle Associations after specified timeout in ms; no timeout if absent
